documentation.title: KoolTabs Class [PHP]
documentation.metadescription: KoolTabs - Powerful PHP Tab Menu - Fast rendering, Flexible CSS Style and Search Engine Friendly make KoolTabs the great PHP Tab Menu solution for your website navigation system.
documentation.metakeywords: php tab, php tab menu, php tabstrip, ajax tab menu

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: Get or set the id for KoolTabs.
property.longdesc: Get or set the id for KoolTabs. This id will be use as variable name of KoolTabs at client-side.
property.samplecode: <?php $kts->id="kts";//We usuall use the same id name with server-side for better reference. ?>

property.name: styleFolder
property.shortdesc: Get or set folder which contain css style for KoolTabs.
property.longdesc: Get or set folder which contain css style for KoolTabs.

property.name: scriptFolder
property.shortdesc: Get or set folder which contain core file "kooltabs.php".
property.longdesc: Get or set folder which contain core file "kooltabs.php". Normally the path to script folder is automatically added, however in some cases you may need to set it manually.

property.shortdesc: Get or set the width of KoolTabs.
property.longdesc: Get or set the width of KoolTabs.

property.longdesc: Get or set the height of KoolTabs.

property.name: position
property.shortdesc: Get or set the position of KoolTabs.
property.longdesc: Get or set the position of KoolTabs.

property.name: align

value.desc: KoolTabs align tab from the left.
KoolTabs align tabs from the right.
KoolTabs align tabs in the center.
KoolTabs fills tabs in all available space.

property.shortdesc: Get or set the alignment of tabs.
property.longdesc: Get or set the alignment of tabs. This alignment is only effective with "top" and "bottom" position style of KoolTabs.

property.name: scroll

value.desc: Both scrolling arrows align to left.
Both scrolling arrows align to right.
Left-scrolling arrow align to left-hand side and right-scrolling arrow aligns to the right-hand side.

property.shortdesc: Get or set the scrollment of tabs.
property.longdesc: Get or set the scrollment of tabs. This scrollment is only effective with "top" and "bottom" position style of KoolTabs.
